channel.description: Recent changes in Extranet on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Inventory-X: Overview
item.description:
Extranet Overview Inventory extranet allows you, as a Buyer, to configure the SetUp of the dynamic inventory you want to access from all the Channel Managers connected to you. You will have access to different tools, components and panels to create, modify or edit hotels, rates, rooms and sales conditions. Inventory is also available to load your own static contracts as a Seller: load allotment, prices, discounts, supplements… Sections Once you are logged in, you will be redirected to the home page where you’ll see the following tabs.
[...]

item.title: Inventory-X: Load your inventory
Inventory-X: Tools
item.description:
<a href="/inventory-x/extranet/tools/availability-simulator.1/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-search"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Availability simulator</h3> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/tools/copy-tool/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-copy"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Copy Tool</h3> <p>Copy configurations to make the SetUp process easier and faster</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/tools/delete-product/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-trash"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Delete product</h3> <p>Delete the availability conditions and prices loaded in Inventory-X</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/tools/manage/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-list"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Management</h3> <p>Manage users and hotels</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/tools/permissions/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-users"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Permissions</h3> <p>Assign and manage your users and hotels relation</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/tools/bookings/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-money-check"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Booking List &amp; Price Details</h3> <p>Retrieve booking information from a specific hotel.
[...]

item.title: Inventory-X: FAQ
item.description: <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/faq/discount-supplement/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-file"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Discount/Supplement using derived rates</h3> <p>Know how the create and configurate different discounts or supplements</p> </div> </div> </a> <a href="/inventory-x/extranet/faq/free-children-baby/" class="card"> <div class="inner-card"> <div class="material-icons fa fa-file"></div> <div> <h3 class="text-headline">Free children and Free baby option </h3> <p>Know how the free children and baby option works</p> </div> </div> </a>
